name: Square Jump
description:
This is a simple platformer game, In which a square jump on the platforms. This game has three basic levels  for testing my first game made in unity.

Theme song : 

Royal Coupling by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5743-royal-coupling
